subject: Re: [junit] Junit used for Eclipse UI based Interface
msgSnippet: Hi Kamal, ... Jemmy does not have support for the SWT graphics toolkit, which makes it practically useless for testing Eclipse UI s. As Timothy already
messageBody:
Hi Kamal,

On 9/21/06, Kamal Ahmed <KAhmed@...> wrote:
> For the simulation testing, I am looking at [Jemmy] to see
> if it can also be used for Eclipse UI's.

Jemmy does not have support for the SWT graphics toolkit, which makes
it practically useless for testing Eclipse UI's. As Timothy already
mentioned, you should take a look at Abbot instead. Last I looked,
Abbot didn't have a release out with support for SWT but they had some
preliminary SWT stuff in their Subversion repository.

-Lasse-
